function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of robotics for meal preparation and sanitization may lead to cross-contamination if not properly managed.","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the disease through contaminated surfaces and food.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for robot maintenance and food handling.","Technologies":"UV sterilization, HEPA filters for air purification.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors.","Owner":"Facility management, hygiene department, robotics team."},{"Description":"Drones transporting medical equipment and samples may encounter technical malfunctions or errors, leading to delays or loss of critical supplies.","Impact":"Disruption of healthcare services and compromised patient care.","Mitigation":"Implement redundant systems, regular maintenance, and contingency plans for supply chain disruptions.","Technologies":"GPS tracking, payload monitoring sensors, redundant propulsion systems.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, emergency responders.","Owner":"Logistics team, drone operators, supply chain management."},{"Description":"Use of facial recognition and big data for monitoring citizens raises privacy and surveillance concerns.","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of personal data, and erosion of civil liberties.","Mitigation":"Adhere to strict privacy laws, obtain consent for data collection, and limit data retention.","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data encryption, privacy-preserving algorithms.","People":"Citizens, civil rights advocates, data protection authorities.","Owner":"Government, law enforcement, data protection agencies."}]}
